original: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca

original: nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sappaṭighaḥ ca na appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sappaṭighañca na appaṭighañca dhammam paṭicca na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate nava
sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo naappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa
analyzed: dhammaḥ na appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa

original: ca naappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca na appaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte nava,
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā cattāri anantare ekam pe sahajāte nava

original: aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ,
analyzed: aññamaññe cha nissaye nava upanissaye dve purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane eka

original: kamme …pe… āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte
analyzed: kamme pe āhāre tīṇi indriye pañca jhāne magge tīṇi sampayutte eka vippayutte
